mapper.select: select a.goods_code goodsCode, a.goods_name goodsName, b.store_code storeCode, b.store_name storeName, a.goods_introduce goodsIntroduce, a.sale_price salePrice, a.image_path imagePath, a.a_level appraiseLevel, a.sum_sale sumSale, a.version version from t_goods a LEFT JOIN t_store b on a.store_code = b.store_code where a.goods_code = #{goodsCode} and a.is_deleted = 0

select b.user_acct, a.appraise_detail, a.a_level, a.create_time, a.user_code from t_goods_appraise a,t_sys_user b where a.user_code = b.user_code and a.is_deleted = 0 and a.goods_code = #{goodsCode}
and (a.a_level = 0 or a.a_level = 1)
and (a.a_level = 2 or a.a_level = 3)
and (a.a_level = 4 or a.a_level = 5)
select a.class_name classFirstName, a.class_code classFirstCode, a.version version from t_goods_class a where a.is_deleted = 0 and a.last_class_code is null order by create_time desc
select class_name, class_code from t_goods_class where is_deleted = 0 and last_class_code = #{lastClassCode} order by create_time desc

select goods_code goodsCode, goods_name goodsName, image_path imagePath, sale_price salePrice from t_goods where class_second_code = #{classSecondCode} and is_deleted = 0 and goods_state = 2 and audit = 1 order by create_time desc
select dic_code areaCode, dic_name areaName from t_dictionary where parent_code = #{parentCode} order by dic_code
